Emerging growth company &#9744; If an emerging growth company, indicate by check mark if the registrant has elected not to use the extended transition period for complying with any new or revised financial accounting standards provided pursuant to Section 13(a) of the Exchange Act. &#9744; &#160; &#160; &#160; Item&#8201;8.01 Other Events. As previously disclosed, Broadcom Inc. (the &#8220;Company&#8221;) completed its acquisition of VMware, Inc. (&#8220;VMware&#8221;, and such acquisition, the &#8220;VMware Merger&#8221;) on November&#160;22, 2023. The Company is filing this Current Report on Form 8-K to provide certain pro forma financial information regarding the VMware Merger for the fiscal year ended November&#160;3, 2024. &#160; Item&#8201;9.01 Financial Statements and Exhibits. (b) Pro forma financial information. The unaudited pro forma condensed combined financial information of the Company, giving effect to the VMware Merger, for the fiscal year ended November&#160;3, 2024 and the accompanying notes thereto, are filed as Exhibit 99.1 and incorporated herein by reference.
